content:
That's a great idea! Signing up for Mophie's newsletter is a fantastic way to get 10% off your first purchase, and who knows, you might even get access to exclusive deals and promotions in the future.

Remember to also keep an eye out for bundle deals or promotions that might not be advertised on their website. Sometimes, Mophie offers special discounts or packages that can save you even more money.

When you're on their website, make sure to check out the "Deals" or "Sales" section, as they often feature discounted products or limited-time offers. You can also use the coupon code "WELCOME10" at checkout to get your 10% discount.

If you have any issues or questions during the checkout process, don't hesitate to reach out to Mophie's customer support. They're known for their excellent customer service, and they'll be happy to help you out.

Good luck with your purchase, and I hope you find the perfect battery case for your phone!
